about_the_game:
Pure Hearts is a social-oriented MMORPG with sandbox elements.


This is a fantasy world where players join their forces in one of the world cities in order to gain wealth and influence.

Game World Map: the game world contains many varied locations which are connected to each other through the global world map. Discover unique biomes and claim their resources!


Random events: the game world is not static, new event locations appear every day. Who knows what kind of treasures can be found there?


Combat: the game has a decent combat system with blocks, parries and feints. Hone your fighting skills to become the finest fencer!

Cities: the player can become the citizen of one of the world's cities or they may choose to stay as an independent traveler. The city provides facilities to its citizens such as a marketplace, warehouses, craft stations and much more.


Clans: gather your friends and create a clan to claim your authority within the city’s walls. Defend your city from the invaders or conquer other cities in clan wars!

Gather resources, create goods, trade, fight and live in the world of Pure Hearts!
